item.description:
Happy Hour Snacks + Drinks + Harvard SQ Cambridge+ CHOCOLATE!!

Happy Hour is nightly from 5:00 pm to 7:30 pm during which times all food on the menu is half price with a $3 minimum beverage purchase per person.

If possible, i would appreciate it if a few of you would get there early, @ 4:45 to start grabbing tables. Note if we get lots of yeses we may split up into several tables. Please try to come at or Before 5:00PM by almost 5:15PM the place is full and I doubt we can get or hold any tables if people come too late.

If you come after 5:15 PM I cannot be sure you all will be sitting together at one table with our group, I just wanted to warn people!

Grendel's Den has been serving casual gourmet dishes and international specialties in the same location for over 35 years. They have a full bar and an beer selection reknown for its high quality selection of imports, microbrews and Hot Cider with Rum.

LATER, @ 7:30 - 8:30 DESSERT !!Walk one block to enjoy French pasteries at "FINALE", 30 Dunster Street (Holyoke Center- across the street from J. Harvard Brewery) to get a VALENTINE'S DAY CHOCOLATE FIX!!! Please indicate in your rsvp comment if you will be "counted in" for dessert. I will need to hear from you before 12 noon Sunday in order to get an accurate head count for our reserved corner table for 8 chocolate/dessert lovin' junkies (btw- my favs are creme brule & chocolate mouse)
GET READY TO SALIVATE AS YOU TURN THE PAGES on this site below... You may choose to buddy up and share a scrumptious platter for two!!! OR order individually one small tasty treat with a cup of cappuccino


This is an easy T accessible event. Take the RED line to Harvard Square. Parking validation is available from FINALE. Check FINALE web page for details on where to park and prices.
item.how_to_find_us: Lauren will be wearing a rabbit fur hat
item.name: GRENDEL'S DEN
